comments: Excellent professor, and a forbidding intellect. He will push you hard and reward you handsomely, but don\'t expect to be babied.

I took a seminar outside of Reed College with Dr. Slifkin. I think he is very passionate about his subject. I did however expect more from a Yale grad. On his behalf, the group he was teaching was quite motley, I myself was fresh from Oregon\'s State Penitentiary. Though I was quite interested in everything he said, I couldn\'t develop a connection.
Not for Hum. Slifkin rocks the house with Art History, but he\'s not the guy you want for HUM220 because he will coddle you on everything else.
Robert Slifkin is an amazing professor. Very intelligent and just a joy to listen. He is very enthusiastic about his subjects which in-turn make class with him truly unforgettable.
